_objs:
# {title} Returns layer number $E - Bracelet. Normally, that should be a simple constant, not function. But due to backwards compatibility it should be keeped as function.
### DWS\Pascal Script: ```pascal function BraceLayer : Byte; ``` DWS\Pascal Script Example: ```pascal {If there is something on a layer, then remove} if ObjAtLayer(BraceLayer) <> 0 then begin unequip(BraceLayer); wait(1000); end; ``` ### Python: ```python def BraceLayer(): --> ubyte ```
